pageContext.claim: “I salute for probably an hour and a half, maybe more, but around that. Watch, if I'm off like two minutes, They'll say, he exaggerated. It was only an hour and twenty five minutes. He exaggerated, he lied, he lied. He's a liar. These people are sick, the fake news.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump appears to be referring to The Fact Checker. We would not say he lied if he was off by two minutes; we certainly would not note that in this database.
